text: I was supposed to be issued 84 tablets acetylCYSTEINE Efferverscent Tablets on my discharge on Fri 21 March 2025, on reaching home, there was none inside the packed plastic bags. I tried to email the appointment email but got an acknowledgement. Tried calling but it was useless long wait.  Nric S019131A Bed N053010. Pls try to contact me ASAP.
I bought my medicine here. The pharmacy has sufficient stock for my needs. Except the waiting time, nothing else to feedback but all good.
Poor service and attitude. When I said I do not need Panadol, the staff said take or not still will get charged. What rubbish is this. Waste of medical resources. MOH should review this practice

Lousy Service..Dont really bother about you even if u approach them... but if they get a customer who gives so much sales to them, they will keep on enertaining them.. The cashier(chinese fellow)  and the lady(im not sure whether she's a malay or pinoy) Poor Service.. .. I have to wait so long just to get a walking frame for my dad and furthermore it was my first time getting a walking frame and so naturally i needed someone to assist me... I wont want to step into this store(Health & U at NUH) ever again...
The pharmacy did not do work, keep giving me reasons.
